text: Egha an asɨzir gumazamiziba ofan bar isia mɨghɨrizim bagha inigha izezir kamningɨn mamɨn ofa gami. An amir ofan kam, arazir me zurara mɨzarazibar ofa damuamibar gɨn zui. Egha a plaua inigha witɨn ofa damuasa a tue. A uan dafarir zɨvɨrizimɨn plauan mabar suigha, ofa gamir dakozimɨn da tuezɨ avim bar dar isia zuima da bar mɨghɨrizɨ, averenir kɨnim oto.
